page.title: 20S.NORMANTON/PINXTON-AUTHORS
page.content: The information on this block has been compiled by the children and staff of The Glebe Junior School,Sth. Normanton (Headmaster:Mr.D.J.Haslock).The help of the staff and children of Kirkstead County Jun. School,Pinxton(Headmaster: Mr.E.G.Reynolds) is also gratefully acknowledged. {Children who composed/typed in text: L.Bartlett,G.Baxter,P.Blackwell, C.Boyington,D.Brown,M.Carby,P.Clapton, L.Feiner,L.Fellows,J.Fisher,D.Hallot, M.Howard,D.Marlow,L.Mosley,H.Newstead, G.Noble,L.Peck,N.Pemberton,M.Stringer, S.Tomlinson,R.Ward,A.Wright M.Wheatley. {Staff involved with the project: Mrs.J.Boffey,Mr.B.Chandler, Mr.D.Hanbury,Mr.C.Hartley, Miss J.Naylor Aerial photographs courtesy of Derby- shire Constabulary.
